forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 22. Wind chill values as low as -5. Northwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 1. Wind chill values as low as -10. West wind around 10 mph.

weather_report:
A crisp dawn stirs over Boston, cloaked in a serene clarity, as the sun inches its way higher into the brightening sky. Today’s forecast promises a predominantly sunny finish, ushering in warmth near 22 degrees, despite a cheeky wind chill that dares to plunge as low as -5. The gentle northwest breeze, breathing softly at 7 to 10 mph, brings with it a whisper of winter, imbuing the air with an invigorating chill. 

As night approaches, the chill will deepen—forecasted lows of around 1 degree could send temperatures plummeting to a shivering -10 with the wind. Such conditions call for ample layers; woolen gloves and scarves will serve well against the bite of the cold. A thick coat would be a wise addition, perhaps even a stylish hat, to frame the face against the elements. Given the clarity of this winter canvas, locals might find solace in a leisurely stroll through the common or a quiet coffee at a cozy café, cradling warmth while reflecting on the day. Enjoying the multitude of vibrant nuances that winter uniquely bestows is a cherished embrace, and today invites one to relish these enduring moments.
